modules.description: This module implements point-to-point and collective communication mechanisms for distributed parallel computing, handling typed data (integers, floats, arrays, bigarrays) across processes via communicators, ranks, and groups. It supports synchronization barriers, data distribution (scatter/gather), global reductions (sum/max), and topology management (Cartesian grids), enabling use cases like parallel numerical simulations, distributed data aggregation, and domain decomposition with explicit buffer control or non-blocking operations.
